description: Try our easy to follow Building Blocks cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Building Blocks cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Decorate the iced cubes using a different combination of white chocolate letters and numbers, and assorted icing kits to add your own special touch. Serve. Tip 1: Cutting base - To level cakes: measure from the flat base up and insert toothpicks around the cake. Place a hand on the top of cake and, with a large knife, slowly slice through the cake, using the toothpicks as a guide. Tip 2: Cutting blocks - Cut the second cake in the same way. Stick the two halves together with icing. Measure into 6 even pieces and mark the blocks with toothpicks. Cut into cubes, using the toothpicks as a guide.
